{{html:
<div ng-controller="AccountTemplateController">
<table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Name</th>
            <th>Description</th>
            <th>Size</th>
            <th>Status</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr ng-repeat="template in filteredTemplates">
            <td>{[template.name]}</td>
            <td>{[template.description]}</td>
            <td>{[template.size]}</td>
            <td>{[template.status]}</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
</div>
    <script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/AccountTemplateController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/machineServices.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
}}
